docs.lead_paragraph: Dr. Isidor Schwaner Ravdin advanced a strong family medical heritage to become one of the nation's leading surgeons and educators until recent years when failing health from the effects of arteriosclerosis forced him to retire to a nursing home.
docs.snippet: Dr. Isidor Schwaner Ravdin advanced a strong family medical heritage to become one of the nation's leading surgeons and educators until recent years when failing health from the effects of arteriosclerosis forced him to retire to a nursing home.
